doc:
Robert F. Simon https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_F._Simon 0 Robert F. Simon (December 2, 1908 – November 29, 1992) was an American character actor, often portraying military or authority figure roles. Though his face was recognized by audiences, he was mostly unknown by name. A life member of The Actors Studio, Simon appeared in films and on television between 1950 and 1985, having mastered the genre of westerns, drama, and comedy. Robert_F._Simon ( December_2_,_1908 – November_29_,_1992 ) was an_American_character_actor , often portraying military or authority_figure_roles . Though his_face was_recognized by audiences , he was mostly_unknown by name . A_life_member of The_Actors_Studio , Simon appeared in films and on television between 1950_and_1985 , having_mastered the_genre of westerns , drama , and comedy .
